players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I think the mafia killed Diana. Who do you think is the mafia?"
Bob: "I investigated Alice and found her to be the mafia. I think we should vote her out."
You: "I think Bob is lying, maybe he's the mafia. I didn't kill Diana."
You: "I think Bob is lying. He might be the mafia. I didn't kill Diana. Maybe Charlie is the detective."
Charlie: "text"
Bob: "Alice, I investigated you and found you mafia. You know I'm detective, yet you accuse Bob. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob

Alice: "I think Bob is lying, maybe he's the mafia. I didn't kill Diana."
Alice: "I think Bob is lying. He might be the mafia. I didn't kill Diana. Maybe Charlie is the detective."

You: "Alice, I investigated you and found you mafia. You know I'm detective, yet you accuse Bob. Vote Alice."
